release.action: Handle empty modify date fields in "migrate xmltable" command.
Added maven projects "remote-adapter" and "iview2-tile-client" to "iview2-addons" module as part of the MyCoRe build process.
mycore-iview2 classes are now in package org.mycore.iview2
Provided antlib.xml to define ant tasks. This requires an update in ant build files.
Moved MCRConfigurationTask to package org.mycore.buildtools.anttasks. This requires an update in ant build files.
Added XALAN-Extension in MCRXMLFunctions to get the sources of a MCRMetaLinkID for a given MCRObjectID.
Fixed inheritance of metadata if more than one metadata is inherited.
Added validation messages to datamodel classes to see in the log why the validation had failed.
Added Changelog, Changes, Developer Activity and File Activity Reports
Renamed artifacts mycore-parent to mycore and mycore to mycore-parent.
Datamodel classes like MCRObject and MCRDerivate are just data containers and do not any persistence operation. This is done by MCRMetadataManager.
Renamed MCRXMLTableManager to MCRXMLMetadataManager and MCRXMLTableEventHandler to MCRXMLMetadataEventHandler.
Tagged first beta version of MyCoRe 2.1
